info.description:
This is a collection of APIs to support the In2Work Application

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/i1/in2work`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: In2Work

get.summary: Gets Facility Data by Profit Center
Gets User Facility (Instructor) Data by Profit Center
Gets Facility Program Data by Profit Center
Gets Facility Program Component Data by Profit Center

requestBody.description: Facility Program Component to be created

200.description: Status of Facility Program Component Creation

facility_program_component_id.description: ID of the facility program component

requestBody.description: Facility Program Component to be edited

200.description: Status of Facility Program Component Edit

facility_program_component_id.description: ID of the facility program component
ID of the facility program component

get.summary: Gets Student Facility Data by Profit Center

put.summary: Edit a Student Facility. This will Deactive existing records for a Student and replace with a new Student Facility

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

startDateFromParam.name: start_date_from
startDateFromParam.description: Starting Date for a Class. YYYY-MM-DD Format.

startDateToParam.name: start_date_to
startDateToParam.description: Starting Date for a Class. YYYY-MM-DD Format.

endDateFromParam.name: end_date_from
endDateFromParam.description: Ending Date for a Class. YYYY-MM-DD Format.

endDateToParam.name: end_date_to
endDateToParam.description: Ending Date for a Class. YYYY-MM-DD Format.

profitCenterParam.name: profit_center
profitCenterParam.description: provide business organization code in URL to filter data set

emailParam.name: email
emailParam.description: email address of the user logged into the application

isAdminParam.name: is_admin
isAdminParam.description: flag denoting if the logged in user is an admin of the application

isAdminNRParam.name: is_admin
isAdminNRParam.description: flag denoting if the logged in user is an admin of the application

searchUserParam.name: search
searchUserParam.description: used to search against User Email, First Name or Last Name.  Limited to 50 characters

userRoleParam.name: role_id
userRoleParam.description: comma separated list of IDs used to limit the results by type of user. 15-Admin, 16-Instructor, 17-Read Only

searchFacilityParam.name: search
searchFacilityParam.description: used to search against Profit Center Name or Profit Center Value for a Facility. Limited to 20 characters

searchProgramParam.name: search
searchProgramParam.description: used to search against Program Name. Limited to 20 characters

searchComponentParam.name: search
searchComponentParam.description: used to search against Component Name. Limited to 20 characters

searchModuleParam.name: search
searchModuleParam.description: used to search against Module Name. Limited to 20 characters

componentSortByParam.name: sort_by
componentSortByParam.description: used to determine which value to sort dataset. "display_order" or "name"

studentNameParam.name: name
studentNameParam.description: Name of the student. This will search against students in the same facility as the logged in User

studentDocNumParam.name: doc_num
studentDocNumParam.description: DOC Number of the student. This will search against all students in the system

searchStudentParam.name: search
searchStudentParam.description: used to search against Student Name or DOC Num. Limited to 20 characters

facilityProgramComponentIdParam.name: facility_program_component_id
facilityProgramComponentIdParam.description: ID of the Facility Program Component

facilityProgramComponentIdReqParam.name: facility_program_component_id
facilityProgramComponentIdReqParam.description: ID of the Facility Program Component

typeParam.name: type
typeParam.description: used to identify the type of General Master data to return

userIdParam.name: user_id
userIdParam.description: ID of the user for which an action if being performed

userIdNRParam.name: user_id
userIdNRParam.description: ID of the user for which an action if being performed

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.
